Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that it was Hillary Clinton and her campaign who started the "birther" movement.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the role of Hillary Clinton and her campaign in starting the "birther" movement.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Hillary Clinton and her campaign started the "birther" movement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Hillary Clinton and her campaign were responsible for starting the "birther" movement without providing sufficient evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the origins of the "birther" movement that are not considered in the claim.
